co.cask.cdap.api.data.batch
Interface RecordScannable<RECORD>

Type Parameters:
RECORD - the type of objects that represents a single record
All Superinterfaces:
Closeable
All Known Implementing Classes:
KeyValueTable
@Beta
public interface RecordScannable<RECORD>
extends Closeable

Represents data sets that can be processed in batches, as series of records (as apposed to key/value pairs). See BatchReadable.

Method Summary

          Creates a reader for the split of a dataset.
 Type getRecordType()
          The type of records that the dataset exposes as a schema.

          Returns all splits of the dataset.
 
Methods inherited from interface java.io.Closeable
close
 

Method Detail

getRecordType

Type getRecordType()
The type of records that the dataset exposes as a schema. The schema will be derived from the type using reflection.

Returns:
the schema type.

getSplits

List<Split> getSplits()
Returns all splits of the dataset.

For feeding the whole dataset into a batch job.

Returns:
A list of Splits.

createSplitRecordScanner

RecordScanner<RECORD> createSplitRecordScanner(Split split)
Creates a reader for the split of a dataset.

Parameters:
split - The split to create a reader for.
Returns:
The instance of a RecordScanner.
